Since headers are metadata, the cursor should filter out any headings and focus on the actual text content.

I'll set up the cursor with the name "search_cursor" and the filterDescription as "Mentions of 'профессор Звёздочкин' in the text, excluding headers." The maxEvidenceCount should be 1 to get the first occurrence. Then, using agent-run_agent with this cursor will help find the first mention.
